title: The grammar warre. Or The eight parts of speach, noune, pronoune. verbe, participle, aduerbe, coniunction, preposition, interiection, altogether by the eares Together with the lamentable burning of a petty schoole.
author: Guarna, Andrea.
publisher: printed by Robert Raworth, for Thomas Spencer,
notes: A translation by William Hayward of: Guarna, Andrea. Bellum grammaticale.
Editor's preface signed: I.S., i.e. John Spencer?.
The words "noune, .. participle," and "aduerbe, .. interiection," are bracketed together on title page.
"A lamentation upon the conflagration of the Muses habitation: or a discription of the burning of a pettie schoole", last leaf, is in verse.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery, San Marino, California.
